name: Robetrotter
description:
The Globetrotter Robetrotter trotters around the globe!

Dodge the Obstacles by Jumping with
W, Space or Up Arrow

When holding down Jump, you will jump higher.

The Game was created by F4B1 using

the Unity Game Engine,
Aseprite & Photoshop for Sprites,
Beepbox for Music,
Audacity, SFXIA and BFXR for sounds.
